artist: Designer: Larsen Design Studio, New York; Mill: Sekers Fabrics Ltd.; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: Double weave all worsted wool cloth with small triangle ptn. . Vert. rpt 10.25"; horiz. 17.75". Fabric is reversible Double weave all worsted wool cloth (olive & purple weft, light & dark purple warp) with geometrical pattern of alternate rows of purple triangles arranged on vertical purple bands. red maple
